CustomField.description: Ability to navigate through complex set of issues to find efficient and sufficient solution. -Proactive: Ability to anticipate and be able to offer preemptive advice or solutions in daily operations -Act as an intermediary between client, vendors, authorities and colleagues on financial issues for amicable resolution of differences
